bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for AC Generator Protection
Redline
IEEE Guide for AC Generator Protection - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.102 -2006 (Revision of IEEE Std C37.102-1995) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A review of the generally accepted forms of relay protection for the synchronous generator and its excitation system is presented. This guide is primarily concerned with protection against faults and abnormal operating conditions for large hydraulic, steam, and combustion turbine generators.combustion turbine generators.

A review of the generally accepted forms of relay protection for the synchronous generator and its excitation system is presented. This guide is primarily concerned with protection against faults and abnormal operating conditions for large hydraulic, steam, and combustion turbine generators.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
